H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H819.def: = state of being responsible for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly

H2766.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5818.def: = man, also known as {L:Azariah<SDBH:עֲזַרְיָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}; tribe of Judah; ► father of {L:Jotham<SDBH:יֹותָם>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

H5417.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zuar<SDBH:צוּעָר>}; tribe of {L:Issachar<SDBH:יִשָּׂשכָר>}; ► chief, time of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}

H3107.def: = man, also known as {L:Zabad<SDBH:זָבָד>}; ► son of {L:Shimeath<SDBH:שִׁמְעָת>}, an {L:Ammonite<SDBH:עַמֹּונִי>} woman; ► he was a servant of {L:Joash<SDBH:יֹואָשׁ>}, king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, who murdered his master with the help of {L:Jehozabad<SDBH:יְהֹוזָבָד>}, son of {L:Shimrith<SDBH:שִׁמְרִית>}; both were later killed by {L:Joash<SDBH:יֹואָשׁ>}' successor {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}

H3881.def: = man and tribe; ◄ third son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, later responsible for temple duties

H3107.def: = man, also known as {L:Zabad<SDBH:זָבָד>}; ► son of {L:Shimeath<SDBH:שִׁמְעָת>}, an {L:Ammonite<SDBH:עַמֹּונִי>} woman; ► he was a servant of {L:Joash<SDBH:יֹואָשׁ>}, king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, who murdered his master with the help of {L:Jehozabad<SDBH:יְהֹוזָבָד>}, son of {L:Shimrith<SDBH:שִׁמְרִית>}; both were later killed by {L:Joash<SDBH:יֹואָשׁ>}' successor {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}

H7041.def: = man, also known as {L:Kelita<SDBH:קְלִיטָא>}; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► Levite who had married a foreign wife during the exile and had to divorce her

H7042.def: = man, also known as {L:Kelaiah<SDBH:קֵלָיָה>}; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► Levite who had married a foreign wife during the exile and had to divorce her

H6611.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H7891.def: = action by which one utters words with a set or improvised tune, whether accompanied by musical instruments and dancing or not

H7778.def: = a person responsible for guarding the entrance of a town or building

H2928.def: = town, probably identical to {L:Telaim<SDBH:טְלָאִים>}; ◄ territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, probably about 50 kilometers south of {L:Hebron<SDBH:חֶבְרֹון>}, in the {L:Negeb<SDBH:נֶגֶב>}

H221.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Hur<SDBH:חוּר>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► father of {L:Bezalel<SDBH:בְּצַלְאֵל>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H6551.def: = very small (about 1.25 millimeters long) black, jumping insect that sucks blood in its adult phase, inflicting itching bites as they do so; its hind legs are adapted for jumping; ◄ |iPulex irritans;|i* ► parasitic on man, but with other subspecies that also live on dogs, camels, and other mammals; ≈ regarded as a nuisance, though insignificant

H7422.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H3150.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H4326.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H499.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}

H5867.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shem<SDBH:שֵׁם>}; ► regarded as founder of a nation with the same name

H5660.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Malluch<SDBH:מַלּוּךְ>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► ancestor of {L:Ethan<SDBH:אֵיתָן>}

H5819.def: = man; ► married foreign wife; after exile

H6270.def: = man; ► married foreign wife; after exile

H3437.def: = man, also known as {L:Job<SDBH:יֹוב>}; ◄ son of {L:Issachar<SDBH:יִשָּׂשכָר>}

H7594.def: = man; ◄ descendant of {L:Bani<SDBH:בָּנִי>}; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H5733.def: = man; ◄ descendant of {L:Pahath-Moab<SDBH:פַּחַת מֹואָב>}; ► married foreign wife; after exile

H3636.def: = man; ◄ descendant of {L:Pahath-Moab<SDBH:פַּחַת מֹואָב>}; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H1212.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Uri<SDBH:אוּרִי>}, tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► craftsman working on {L:tabernacle<SDBH:מִשְׁכָּן>}

H1131.def: = man; ► father of {L:Noadiah<SDBH:נֹועַדְיָה>}, Levite, after exile

H4519.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H2766.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► family head in charge of a division of {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}; time of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H8095.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ second son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H1144.def: = man (called {L:Ben-Oni<SDBH:בֶּן־אֹונִי>} by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H2828.def: = man; ► after exile; stood to the left of {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>} when he read from the book of the {L:Law<SDBH:תֹּורָה>}

H4982.def: = man; ◄ descendant of {L:Hashum<SDBH:חָשֻׁם>}; ► married foreign wife; after exile

H4992.def: = man; ► married foreign wife; after exile

H3413.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H4519.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H4572.def: = man; ► married foreign wife; after exile

H6019.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Kohath<SDBH:קְהָת>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► father of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>}, {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}, and {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; founder of clan of {L:Amramites<SDBH:עַמְרָמִי>}

H177.def: = man; ◄ descendant of {L:Bani<SDBH:בָּנִי>}; ► married a non-Israelite woman; time of {L:Ezra<SDBH:עֶזְרָא>}

H912.def: = man; ► one of the men who had married a non-Israelite woman; after exile

H3622.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H2057.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H4982.def: = man; ◄ descendant of {L:Hashum<SDBH:חָשֻׁם>}; ► married foreign wife; after exile

H3299.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H1131.def: = man; ► father of {L:Noadiah<SDBH:נֹועַדְיָה>}, Levite, after exile

H4367.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H8343.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H8298.def: = man; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H5832.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Benjamin<SDBH:בִּנְיָמִן>}; ► warrior; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3130.def: = man; ◄ eleventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► father of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>} and {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, each founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5015.def: = town; ◄ territory of {L:Reuben<SDBH:רְאוּבֵן>}; ► later part of {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}

H2081.def: = man; ◄ descendant of {L:Nebo<SDBH:נְבֹו>}; ► married a foreign wife; after exile

H3100.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Samuel<SDBH:שְׁמוּאֵל>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► ancestor of {L:Heman<SDBH:הֵימָן>}

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H5237.def: = state in which something or someone is identified as different or strange from one's own perspective

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration
